desc: Abstract Art by Barteu, in this Shop you will find the Best Abstract Paintings, the Best Hoodie and Abstract Fine Art. Buy your Abstract Prints or your Abstract Art for Sale, Large Abstract Painting for Sale and Extra Large Abstract Painting, Abstract T Shirt and Abstract Hoodie and more Abstract Clothing by Barteu

layout.text: Barteu (Filippo Ciiterio) from bartender to artist. Born in Italy and based in France, Barteu combines action painting and flair bartending to creates vibrants artworks with a never seen before art performance .
